about_the_game:
Granite Casket is a claustrophobic horror about crawling through caverns. Careful positioning and awkward angles will be needed to find the crevices within the earth no human was ever designed to go.

Delve through winding caverns through multiple time periods, learning how to navigate with the tools available to those explorers.
Experience a multi-generational story following the legacy of a legendary spelunker.
Navigate through impossibly tight spaces with movement in all 6 degrees of freedom and exhale all your breath to squeeze just that little bit more to make it through the gap.

content_descriptors.notes: Constant themes of Claustrophobia, suffocation and drowning.
